Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SyCPA 123 (chemically synthetic AMPs20; XXD, XXL, fatty acid cyclized lipopeptide, lactam, XXJ, UCSB1e; BBMm)
Sequence Information.Source: bioinformatic predicted bacterial nonribosomal gene cluster,Rhodococcus jostiiRHA1, bacteria-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: the peptide was predicted but made in a different way.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (37.5%) toTemporin-SHfChemical modification:  N-terminus is coupled with fatty acid 3-aminotetradecanoic acid. T3 is a D-amino acid.Activity: active against B. subtilis 168 1A1 (MIC 4 ug/ml), E. faecium Com15 (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 4 ug/ml), E-coli DH5alpha (MIC>64 ug/ml), K-pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC>64 ug/ml), A. baumannii ATCC 17978 (MIC 8 ug/ml), P-aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>64 ug/ml), E-cloacae ATCC 14037 (MIC>64 ug/ml), M-tuberculosis H37RV (MIC>12.5 ug/ml).MOA: it permeabilized bacterial memrbanes. Reg. 12/2021
Literature Information.Author: Chu J, Koirala B, Forelli N, Vila-Farres X, Ternei MA, Ali T, Colosimo DA, Brady SF. 2020
Literature Information.Title: Synthetic-Bioinformatic Natural Product Antibiotics with Diverse Modes of Action.
